rows.label: tev015201_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev015201_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Wang about the administrative district.

rows.label: tev015201_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev015201_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Wang if anything is troubling him.

rows.label: tev015201_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Wang about NLA's defenses.

rows.label: tev015201_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Wang about conditions during the enemy attack.

rows.label: tev015201_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask if Wang has any interesting news.

rows.label: tev015201_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Wang about Lao's betrayal.

rows.label: tev015201_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Wang about Lao.

rows.label: tev015201_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Wang about recent developments.

rows.label: tev015201_MSG0001
rows.name:
The administrative district was designed to serve as a
governmental and business center upon the White
Whale's landing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015201_MSG0002
rows.name:
After we crash-landed here on Mira, most of it was
allocated to BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015201_MSG0003
rows.name:
The lower level has hangars used for Skell maintenance.
Most of the repairs are hasty and improvised out of
necessity, but they still do a pretty solid job there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015201_MSG0004
rows.name:
We BLADEs wouldn't be able to fight without the
teams of mechanics and support crew members
backing us up. You'd be wise to remember that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015201_MSG0008
rows.name:
The only thing that's troubling me is the lack of walls
that leaves the lower level of this district exposed to
the elements.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015201_MSG0009
rows.name:
They won't let us use the Outfitter's test hangar in
the industrial district, because that's reserved for new
weapons development and such.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015201_MSG0010
rows.name:
And the hangar behind that giant door?
They're keeping something important in there
and won't so much give us a peek![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015201_MSG0011
rows.name:
The BLADEs who do all the fighting have the hardest
jobs of all, yet look around! This is no place to be
handling precision equipment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015201_MSG0015
rows.name:
We had a special training session just a few days
ago dealing with defensive deployments in the event
of an emergency in New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015201_MSG0016
rows.name:
Until now, the emergency we've primarily been
preparing for is an indigen attack, but this time
it was a hypothetical Ganglion invasion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015201_MSG0017
rows.name:
Did you know that virtually all of the predictive data we
have on the Ganglion comes from your experiences
fighting them?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015201_MSG0018
rows.name:
I guess I'd better contribute more! Ha!
...But what I'm really looking forward to is the day
when we won't need these sorts of scenarios anymore.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015201_MSG0020
rows.name:
It pains me to say this, but I had absolutely no idea
that defending the restricted hangar was such an
important priority.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015201_MSG0021
rows.name:
Our entire defensive strategy was based on the
assumption that if their goal was to conquer the city,
they'd attack BLADE Tower...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015201_MSG0022
rows.name:
But if their goal was the extermination of humanity,
they'd attack the Ma-non ship where the civilian
population had taken refuge.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015201_MSG0023
rows.name:
No one expected them to steal the machine in the
restricted hangar and then withdraw![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015201_MSG0024
rows.name:
Why was something so important just sitting in such a
lightly defended hangar in the first place, dammit?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015201_MSG0030
rows.name:
This guy Law from my team told me something
interesting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015201_MSG0031
rows.name: He said he found a key to some incredible treasure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015201_MSG0032
rows.name:
I asked him to show it to me, and it was just a normal
key like you'd use to open an old-fashioned lock.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015201_MSG0033
rows.name:
The rest of the team started making fun of him,
telling him it was probably just some dinky fashion
accessory and that it didn't open anything at all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015201_MSG0034
rows.name:
When I voiced my agreement with that theory,
Law got mad and said I lacked imagination.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015201_MSG0040
rows.name:
After the attack, I couldn't stop beating myself up for
failing to protect the restricted hangar.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015201_MSG0041
rows.name:
When I went to apologize to Lao about it,
he said he was also sorry, and that he shouldn't
have abandoned his post.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015201_MSG0042
rows.name: But Lao had intentionally left the hangar unguarded![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015201_MSG0043
rows.name:
That bastard! The next time I see him on the battlefield,
I'm gonna break his nose but good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015201_MSG0050
rows.name: I heard what happened with Lao. What a fool![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015201_MSG0051
rows.name:
There were so many other ways he could have
expressed that anger.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015201_MSG0052
rows.name:
I can sympathize, but I'll never forgive him for lying. So
if you find his body in the Lifehold Core, let me know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015201_MSG0053
rows.name: I want to give it a good punch in the nose.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015201_MSG1018
rows.name:
So what happened with the treasure that Law's key
opened?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015201_MSG1019
rows.name:
...What? It contained nothing of value? Aw man, what
a complete waste of time! Law treated that thing like it
was his most prized possession![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015201_MSG1020
rows.name:
Ah, well. I guess the flowers for his grave will have
to come out of my own pocket.[ST:wait ]
